TITLE.P: Plant hire framework with and without operator

SHORT_DESCR.P: Norfolk County Council wishes to establish a framework agreement of suppliers for the hire of both operated and non-operated plant and associated equipment. The framework will consist of 5 Lots, each with 3 operational areas. Orders placed off the framework will be awarded on an individual basis It is envisaged that all successful applicants will be appointed to the framework, for those Lots applied for.

This lot includes, but is not restricted to, the hire of the following: 7,5 tonne Three way Tipper Lorries 10 tonne 3 way Tipper Lorries 18 tonne 3 way Tipper Lorries 7.5 tonne Rear end Tipper 9 Ton Hot Box 14 Ton Hot Box Hot Box with Boiler Pot and Trailer Road Sweeper Hiab Lorry 360 degree tracked excavator 361 degree tracked excavator 362 degree tracked excavator 363 degree tracked excavator 364 degree tracked excavator 365 degree tracked excavator 366 degree tracked excavator 367 degree tracked excavator Tractor excavator fitted with specialist grip cleaning equipment Tractor excavator fitted with specialist flail cutting equipment.

TITLE.P: Plant Hire with Operator — labour only option

SHORT_DESCR.P: This lot includes, but is not restricted to, the hire of the following: 180 degree wheeled excavator with 12,18 and 24 Ditching Buckets 7,5 tonne 3 way Tipper Lorries 10 tonne 3 way Tipper Lorries 18 tonne Three way Tipper Lorries 7,5 tonne Rear end Tipper Hiab Lorry 360 degree tracked excavator 361 degree tracked excavator 362 degree tracked excavator 363 degree tracked excavator 364 degree tracked excavator 365 degree tracked excavator 366 degree tracked excavator 367 degree tracked excavator.

TITLE.P: 180 Degree 4 Wheel Drive Excavator with Operator

SHORT_DESCR.P: 180 degree wheeled excavator with 12, 18 and 24 ditching buckets.
This lot includes, but is not restricted to, the hire of the following:

— 180 degree wheeled excavator Post Hole Borer Concrete breaker attachments to suit Slot Cutter Attachment Mechanical Kerb Grab 1 tool compressor 2 tool compressor Breaker gun Hose (5 m min length) CP 9 drill Mini 360 excavator 1 to 1,5 Tonne EO trailer 2 to 3 Tonne EO trailer 360 tracked excavator 5,5 Tonne 7,5 Tonne 13 Tonne 1800 excavator (4 wheel drive) complete with buckets Excavator breaker:
1 tonne swivel tip inc. road tax. 3 tonne swivel tip inc. road tax. 5 tonne swivel tip inc. road tax.

1 tonne standard inc. road tax. Vibrating rollers Compactor plates Forklifts (not for salt) 7 mtr telescopic Hydraulic breaker pack complete with hose and gun Petrol breaker (cobra type) Trench rammer Water pumps Submersible complete with hoses 2? pump complete with hoses Accommodation:- Static welfare unit inc toilet Mess room (groundhog or similar) towable unit inc. servicing Portable toilet inc. servicing Steel store lockable Gas monitor Cable avoidance tool Hammer/breaker drill Pedestrian floor saw Hand held disc cutter with water pump Norton 350 mm brick saw bench Chain saw (petrol) 14?/18? blade Lawn edger (petrol) Shredder/chipper (petrol/diesel) Generators: 2 kva complete 3 kva complete Concrete mixer Barrow mix Trench sheets Props Hydraulic waler frame Hydraulic manhole brace Kerb lifter Vacuum type Vacuum handyman type Scissor scanlift type Scissor manual 2 handled Kerb lifter trolley Hydra clamp drum lifter Pipe laser complete Heras type fencing panels.

This lot includes, but is not restricted to, the hire of the following: 2 way pedestrian push button battery operated temporary signals and associated equipment. 2 way signals complete with traffic control signs: 1 set per head: men at work (750 mm) single file traffic including plate (750 mm) blue arrow (750 mm) and when red light shows wait here board. 3 way complete with traffic control signs: 1 set per head as above. 4 way complete with traffic control signs: 1 set per head as above. Remote control stop/go boards Complete with traffic control signs: 2 no.men at work (750 mm) 2 no. single file traffic inc. plate (750 mm) 3no. blue arrow (750 mm) 2no. traffic control ahead board.

INFO_ADD.P: This procurement will be managed electronically via the Council's e-procurement system. To participate in this procurement, applicants must first be registered on the system at https://in-tendhost.co.uk/norfolkcc
Full instructions for registration and use of the system can be found at https://in-tendhost.co.uk/norfolkcc/aspx/BuyerProfiles

Once registered you will be able to see the procurement project under the “tenders” section and “express an interest” to view the documentation. If you encounter any difficulties whilst using the system you can contact the In-tend support team by phoning +44 8442728810 or e-mailing support@in-tend.co.uk

REVIEW_PROCEDURE.P: VI.4.2) Lodging of appeals: The Public Contracts Regulations 2015 provide for aggrieved parties who have been harmed or are at risk of harm by a breach of the rules to take action in the High Court (England, Wales and Northern EN Standard form 02 - Contract notice 12 / 19 Ireland). Proceedings must be brought within 30 days from the date of knowledge (the date on which the economic operator first knew or ought to have known that grounds for starting the proceedings had arisen) unless the Court considers that there is good reason for extending the period within which proceedings may be brought, in which case the Court may extend that period up to a maximum of 3 months from the date of knowledge.
